Material used.Description: Experiments were conducted using HEK293 cells transfected with wild-type or mutant PINK1 constructs, as well as patient-derived fibroblasts.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced protein expression levels observed for the G209A variant.
Decreased protein stability and reduced kinase activity noted for the K262E variant.
Impaired ubiquitination activity observed for the Y304C variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each experimental condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate to ensure consistency.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 cDNA served as the positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as the negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by post-hoc Tukey's test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels greater than 80% of wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression levels less than 50% of wild-type controls, or significant reduction in enzymatic activity.

Material used.Description: The assay was performed using HEK293 cells transfected with wild-type or mutant PINK1 constructs, as well as patient-derived fibroblasts.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced cell viability observed for the G209A variant.
Decreased cell viability noted for the K262E variant.
Impaired cell survival observed for the Y304C variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each experimental condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate to ensure consistency.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 cDNA served as the positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as the negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by post-hoc Tukey's test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability greater than 80% of wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability less than 50% of wild-type controls, or significant reduction in survival rates.
